Title: This item is sooo CUTE
Comment: These Rush Grass Slippers are not only super comfortable but also absolutely adorable! The little octopus and dolphin design on the top makes me smile every time I wear them. Perfect for summer — breathable, light, and surprisingly sturdy. I might get a second pair!

Title: Great!
Comment: Cute Slippers♡

Title: Fresh and breathable
Comment: These slippers are perfect for summer. The rush grass feels cool underfoot and helps my feet stay dry. I wear them every day after my shower!

Title: My favorite summer slippers
Comment: I didn’t expect much, but they’re so comfy! I even got a matching L size pair for my partner — we love them.

Title: Love this Snoopy design!
Comment: The illustrations are adorable and bring a smile every time I use it. Great for iced coffee or soda.

Title: Perfect gift idea
Comment: I bought this as a present, and the recipient loved the cute box and character print. It’s affordable and thoughtful.

Title: Nostalgic and useful
Comment: Snoopy was my favorite growing up, so this glass brings back memories. It’s also very practical for daily drinks.

Title: Super soft and cute!
Comment: The fabric feels amazing. I love the wombat embroidery — it’s rare and adorable. I wear this set almost every night.

Title: Also good after workouts
Comment: Because it’s absorbent, I use it after yoga or quick workouts. Very comfortable even on sweaty skin.

Title: Embroidery came loose
Comment: One of the animal patches started to fray after a couple of washes. I had to sew it back on.

Title: Too warm in summer
Comment: It’s cozy, but the pile fabric makes it hot in warmer weather. Not as breathable as I’d hoped.

Title: Magical atmosphere
Comment: The way the design lights up is so pretty. I use it on my desk, and it adds a calming vibe in the evenings.

Title: Gift-worthy and soothing
Comment: I gave this to my sister as a birthday gift, and she loved it. It’s relaxing to look at when lit up.

Title: Feels a bit overpriced
Comment: It’s pretty, but considering the size and materials, it felt slightly overpriced.

Title: Box was badly damaged
Comment: The product was okay, but the box looked crushed. Not good if you're buying it as a gift.

Title: Disappointed in quality
Comment: I was disappointed to find the stitching coming loose after just a week.

Title: Poor grip on hard floors
Comment: The anti-slip sole didn't help much on tile. The grip is kind of poor.

Title: Poor quality print
Comment: The Snoopy illustration faded quickly. The quality feels poor for official merch.

Title: Box was badly broken
Comment: The gift box arrived broken and crumpled. Very disappointing packaging.

Title: Love the cute animals!
Comment: I love the little koala and wombat details—super adorable.

Title: Broken on arrival
Comment: Sadly, the glass was broken when I opened the box. Very disappointing.
